short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set a maximum document width and fade citations to improve readability of legal research websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension improves the readability of Westlaw and Lexis documents by (1) setting a maximum document width, and (2) fading citation links within the documents.
